articles.title: Verizon makes Fios free for low-income customers through federal program - The Verge
articles.description: Verizon is introducing discounts to its Fios Forward plan that make it free after a $30-a-month discount through the federal Affordable Connectivity Program.
articles.content:
The Affordable Connectivity Program provides up to $30 a month off internet bills
A discount brings the price from $20 a month to $0 a month.
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
